#labels Phase-Deploy,DB2,Ubuntu
Installation steps for DB2 9.5 on Ubuntu 8 (8.10 intrepid)

= Introduction =

Using DB2 9.5 as the default relational/xml motor enabling xpath/xquery/flowr statements within SQL thereby providing search capabilities.


= Details =

[http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/wikis/display/im/Ubuntu+8.04+-+DB2+9.5 Instructions] detail the major steps for running DB2 9.5 on Ubuntu intrepid.  A repository [http://www.ubuntu.com/partners/ibm/db2 package] exists for Ubuntu feisty (7.10).

== Requirements ==
Verified with the [http://www.debian.org/doc/manuals/apt-howto apt-get] utility that the following packages exist: ibaio1, ksh and libstdc++5.

Ignored that the referenced page is intended for Ubuntu 8.04.

== Steps ==
[http://itsrohith.com/db2.aspx | Page] and as well the [http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/forums/thread.jspa?threadID=187514&tstart=0 forum post] outline the installation process.
